ComicInfo.Summary:
Something is killing the Shuma Goraths! That’s usually great news, but Kulan Gath thinks he’s finally figured out how to consume the elder god, and it’s BAD NEWS for our plane of existence. Dr. Strange and Elektra recruit Conan for their plan to kill Kulan Gath. Now that is some GREAT NEWS.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------|---------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Giangiordano & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Leinil Francis Yu & Sunny Gho | 2 | | Var | Fortnite Variant Cover | Adam Kubert & Frank Martin Jr. | 3 |
ComicInfo.Tags: Shuma-Gorath,Wolverine,Black Widow,Hellstorm,Elektra,Doctor Voodoo,Doctor Strange,Kulan Gath,Magik,Savage Avengers,Kalfu,Daniel Drumm,Sanctum Sanctorum,Conan
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Twelve: It'll Never Last
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Kubert,Frank D'Armata,Frank Martin Jr.,Leinil Francis Yu,Sunny Gho,Valerio Giangiordano
